summary: A better looking version of the standard daedric shield.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod i have done.
I am hoping to get a full set of armor with better colours than what i have now.
i will be working on a full set of daedric amour.
i will be in the future be adding this set as a full stand alone piece so it does not replace all of them in the game.
please bear in mind that i am doing this without seeing it in-game as i only have the textures folder.

i believe that this would be a manual install.
you need to extract the file, then place the textures folder into the data folder of skyrim. skyrim should notice that there is a texture file in there and automatically put it into skyrim.

if there are any problems please comment or message me.
i do not yet know if this mod actually works as i have not been able to test it as i do not have the skyrim game itself, so please leave me feedback on what i can do.

if this mod works could you please upload a picture of the mod in game so everyone could see it, this would be of great help.

If you have anytime pop into the chat room so I can get it properly up and running and popular. talk about mods and the latest games and random chat.
author: jsmoore13
